interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Elegant Hair - 17" PONYTAIL Clip in Hair Piece CURLY Platinum Blonde #16/60 REVERSIBLE Claw Clip 220g Review Date: 2015/03/16 Store: Elegant Hair Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Elegant Hair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '17 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '16.93 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 5.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '799632434306'} Review Text: Fantastic! I own the 22inch hair version as well. Both are great but the 22inch one can weight heavy on the head after 6 to 8 hours (and i suffer from migraines so I have to be careful about that) . this 17inch one is lighter but still VERY full. can wear it all day at work with no issues.
Very curly! very beautiful! Looks real! Review Title: This is elegant HAIR! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Clip in Hair Extensions - Platinum Blonde - Straight - 18in / 46cm - Full Head - 8 Pcs 120g - Japanese Heat Resistant Synthetic Hairpiece - Looks and Feels like Real Hair Elegant Hair {'Brand': 'Elegant Hair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '18 x 38.98 x 0.39 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SCIHLST20920', 'UPC': '799632432838'} fantastic value for fake hair. perfect color. True pale blonde platinum with white like highlights. Great if you bleach your hair!
Very soft. doesnt tangle. blends into your own hair very well. Easy to put on and off. Keep the bag and put them in it when not in use.
Make sure you straighten your own hair first before you put these in because these are SUPER straight! fantastic value for fake hair Elegant Hair - 17" PONYTAIL Clip in Hair Piece CURLY Platinum Blonde #16/60 REVERSIBLE Claw Clip 220g Elegant Hair {'Brand': 'Elegant Hair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '17 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '16.93 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 5.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '799632434306'} Fantastic! I own the 22inch hair version as well. Both are great but the 22inch one can weight heavy on the head after 6 to 8 hours (and i suffer from migraines so I have to be careful about that) . this 17inch one is lighter but still VERY full. can wear it all day at work with no issues.
Very curly! very beautiful! Looks real! This is elegant HAIR!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Preferences**: The user maintains a strong interest in hair extensions, particularly synthetic options that resemble real hair. They have recently shown a preference for both straight and curly styles, likely for versatility in looks.

- **Color and Aesthetic**: The user continues to favor platinum blonde shades, especially with highlights, ensuring that any new purchases align with their aesthetic goals.

- **Product Characteristics**: They prioritize high-quality, easy-to-apply extensions that blend well with natural hair. The user's recent purchase highlights an interest in lighter options that can be worn comfortably for extended periods, without sacrificing fullness or realism.

- **Value for Money**: The user appreciates products that offer excellent value; past experiences have led to satisfaction with high-quality items at reasonable prices.

- **Care Instructions**: The user remains focused on practical care guidelines, favoring instructions that promote longevity and effective maintenance of their hair extensions.

Overall, this user exhibits a consistent preference for functional, aesthetically pleasing hair extensions that are comfortable to wear and easy to maintain. Their recent interest in lighter, curly options reflects a desire for versatility while adhering to their standards for quality and realistic appearance.
